feedback_comments: Limited advancement opportunities in current role. Salary not competitive with market rates.
Great company culture but need clearer career progression paths. Training could be improved.
Excellent compensation but workload unsustainable. Manager expectations too high for work-life balance.
Salary far below market rate. Cost of living adjustments needed. Good learning environment though.
Really enjoyed working here. Team was great. Opportunity came up with significant salary increase.
High stress environment with tight deadlines. Need better project planning and resource allocation.
Love the company but need role with more creative challenges and growth opportunities.
Daily commute became unsustainable with gas prices. Would consider remote work options.
Been in same role too long with no advancement opportunities. Need clearer promotion criteria.
Need more flexibility for family commitments. Otherwise good experience with supportive team.
Great experience overall. Found opportunity in preferred industry vertical with better growth prospects.
Decided to pursue different career path. Company provided good foundation and experience.
Entry level salary too low for living expenses. Need competitive starting salaries for new graduates.
Family relocation required. Very positive experience - would definitely work here again if opportunity arises.
Extreme work stress leading to burnout. Need better workload management and mental health support.
Disagreements on creative direction. Need more input from design team in project planning phase.
Health issues required schedule change. Company was understanding but couldn't accommodate long-term needs.
Found fully remote position with better work-life balance. Enjoyed the team and projects here.
Spouse job transfer required move. Excellent company - highly recommend. Would love to return someday.
